________________________________

From: David M Higgins [mailto:webmaster@darkreach.com]

Posted To: Copyright

Subject: **** SPAM **** US Registered Trademark Infringement


October 7th  2006

Darkreach Communications International Pty Ltd
P.O. Box 1843
CARINDALE
Queensland 4152
AUSTRALIA

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas
TX
75207
USA


Dear Sir or Madam, 

It has come to my attention that a domain -  webhomedirect.org  - that
is hosted by The Planet on the IP - 70.84.47.102 -  contains elements
that are direct infringements of  our US Registered Trademark. 

Namely the text

within the page - http://webhomedirect.org/r/dangerdave+milfs.html 


I am the registered proprietor in the United States of the trademark:
Dangerdave. (Serial Number 75637813)

As you are aware, I have for many years provided legal adult material on
the internet. As a result of my activities, the Dangerdave trademark has
become extremely well known in the adult website space.


Your customer's conduct amounts to blatant infringement of the
Dangerdave trademark in respect of which I am entitled to institute
proceedings for trademark infringement against your customer and your
company.

Your customer's conduct is both misleading and deceptive.

In addition, your customer's conduct constitutes passing off and the
making of false representations and breaches.

I have been advised by my solicitors that I am entitled to institute,
immediately, legal proceedings against your company and would be
entitled to an injunction preventing you and your customer from:-

1. Using the Dangerdave trademark in any manner whatsoever; and
2. Continuing to make false and misleading representations in relation
to the services it offers on the internet.

I would be entitled at my election to damages on account of your
customer's and/or your company's profits and my legal costs.

Unless you cooperate with my request, I will instruct my solicitors to
immediately institute legal proceedings against you.

I demand that you immediately remove the pages so that it is not
substantially identical or misleading, deceptive or confusingly similar
to my trademark.

Unless you fail to comply strictly with my demand within 5 days from the
date of this letter, I will be instructing my solicitors to immediately
commence legal proceedings against your company and be seeking both
interlocutory and permanent injunctions with an account of profit.

Facsimile referencing this email to follow


Yours sincerely,





David Higgins
Owner/Director
Darkreach Communications International Pty Ltd
Phone: 61 7 38434896
Email: webmaster@darkreach.com
DangerDave(r) is a US Registered Trademark
